properties.name: className
properties.description: Adds the specified classes to the root element of the component.
properties.deprecatedTag: Custom CSS is not supported. For testing and other use cases, use [data attributes](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/HTML/Howto/Use_data_attributes).

properties.name: id
properties.description: Adds the specified ID to the root element of the component.
properties.deprecatedTag:
The usage of the `id` attribute is reserved for internal use cases. For testing and other use cases,
use [data attributes](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/HTML/Howto/Use_data_attributes). If you must
use the `id` attribute, consider setting it on a parent element instead.

events.name: onChange
events.description:
Called when the user selects new file(s), or removes a file.
The event `detail` contains the current value of the component.
